audio_playback_object.description: In order to play audio properly on your device, click the button below.

chat.breakout_rooms.confirm_modal.close_break: All breakout rooms will be closed & participants will be moved back to the main room.
chat.breakout_rooms.confirm_modal.start_break: Once started, all participants will be moved to their assigned rooms.
chat.breakout_rooms.empty_main_room: No more participants in the main room.
chat.breakout_rooms.leave_confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave the call? You are in a breakout room, you can join the main room too.
chat.breakout_rooms.move_reason.closed_desc: You are being moved back to the main room
chat.breakout_rooms.move_reason.started_desc: You are being moved to your assigned room
chat.breakout_rooms.status.assign_multiple: Assign multiple participants at once by clicking and selecting them
chat.empty_channel: Send a message to get started

ended_object.disconnected: The call ended because the connection was lost.
ended_object.kicked: You were removed from the meeting.
ended_object.network: Please check your internet connection and try again.
ended_object.rejected: Your request to join the meeting was denied.

chat.leave_confirmation: Are you sure you want to leave the call?

mute_all_object.description: Everyone in the meeting will be muted.

network_object.delay_extended: Taking too long to reconnect. Please check your network connection.
network_object.disconnected: Could not reconnect. Please leave the meeting and try refreshing the window.
network_object.leaving: Automatically leaving the meeting in 10 seconds.
network_object.lost_extended: Connection lost. Please check your network connection.

notifications.remote_control_terminated: Existing remote control has been terminated
notifications.requesting_to_join_meeting: is requesting to join the meeting

offline_object.description: Please ensure that you are connected to the internet.

chat.perm_could_not_start.audio.message: Looks like the system could not capture your microphone. Please restart your device or upgrade your browser to fix this.
chat.perm_could_not_start.screenshare.message: Looks like the system could not capture your screenshare. Please restart your device or upgrade your browser to fix this.
chat.perm_could_not_start.video.message: Looks like the system could not capture your camera. Please restart your device or upgrade your browser to fix this.
chat.perm_denied.audio.chrome.message: Under Chrome settings, navigate to 'Privacy and Security > Site Settings > Permissions'. Select 'Microphone', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.audio.edge.message: Under Edge settings, navigate to 'Site Permissions > Microphone', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.audio.firefox.message: Under Firefox settings, navigate to 'Privacy and Security > Permissions > Microphone', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.audio.microsoft edge.message: Under Edge settings, navigate to 'Site Permissions > Microphone', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.audio.others.message: From your browser settings, enable 'Microphone' permissions and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.audio.safari.message: Under Safari settings, navigate to 'Websites > Microphone', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.screenshare.chrome.message: Under Chrome settings, navigate to 'Privacy and Security > Site Settings > Permissions'. Select 'Screenshare', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.screenshare.edge.message: Under Edge settings, navigate to 'Site Permissions > Screenshare', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.screenshare.firefox.message: Under Firefox settings, navigate to 'Privacy and Security > Permissions > Screenshare', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.screenshare.microsoft edge.m: Under Edge settings, navigate to 'Site Permissions > Screenshare', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.screenshare.others.message: From your browser settings, enable 'Screenshare' permissions and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.screenshare.safari.message: Under Safari settings, navigate to 'Websites > Screenshare', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.video.chrome.message: Under Chrome settings, navigate to 'Privacy and Security > Site Settings > Permissions'. Select 'Camera', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.video.edge.message: Under Edge settings, navigate to 'Site Permissions > Camera', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.video.firefox.message: Under Firefox settings, navigate to 'Privacy and Security > Permissions > Camera', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.video.microsoft edge.message: Under Edge settings, navigate to 'Site Permissions > Camera', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.video.others.message: From your browser settings, enable 'Camera' permissions and reload this application.
chat.perm_denied.video.safari.message: Under Safari settings, navigate to 'Websites > Camera', provide permission and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.audio.android.message: On you device, navigate to 'Settings > Apps'. Select your browser, allow Microphone permissions and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.audio.ios.message: On your iPhone, navigate to 'Settings > Privacy > Microphone', allow access to your browser and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.audio.macos.message: Open Apple Menu, Navigate to 'System Settings > Privacy & Security > Microphone'. Allow access to your browser and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.audio.others.message: Navigate to your system settings. Allow 'Microphone' permissions for your browser and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.audio.windows.message: Go to windows settings, select 'Settings > Privacy > Microphone'. Allow permissions to your browser and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.screenshare.android.mess: On you device, navigate to 'Settings > Apps'. Select your browser, allow Screenshare permissions and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.screenshare.ios.message: On your iPhone, navigate to 'Settings > Privacy > Screenshare', allow access to your browser and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.screenshare.macos.messag: Open Apple Menu, Navigate to 'System Settings > Privacy & Security > Screenshare'. Allow access to your browser and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.screenshare.others.messa: Navigate to your system settings. Allow 'Screenshare' permissions for your browser and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.screenshare.windows.mess: Go to windows settings, select 'Settings > Privacy > Screenshare'. Allow permissions to your browser and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.video.android.message: On you device, navigate to 'Settings > Apps'. Select your browser, allow Camera permissions and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.video.ios.message: On your iPhone, navigate to 'Settings > Privacy > Camera', allow access to your browser and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.video.macos.message: Open Apple Menu, Navigate to 'System Settings > Privacy & Security > Camera'. Allow access to your browser and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.video.others.message: Navigate to your system settings. Allow 'Camera' permissions for your browser and reload this application.
chat.perm_sys_denied.video.windows.message: Go to windows settings, select 'Settings > Privacy > Camera'. Allow permissions to your browser and reload this application.

tooltip.conferenceDefinition: if all participants can appear on screen.
tooltip.greatForAnnouncements: Great for announcements, classes, AMAs — attendees join as viewers.
tooltip.groupChats: Group chats, panels, co-working — everyone can appear on camera.
tooltip.webinarDefinition: if only you appear on screen; viewers join as audience.

utils.agreeTOS: I agree to the site’s Terms of Service and I am of legal adult age in my jurisdiction.
utils.sorryCantJoin: Sorry, we can't join the meeting at the moment. Please try again later.

validations.roomNameContent: Room name can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and hyphens
validations.roomNameLength: Room name must be between 3 and 50 characters
